subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: From the {{w|Cursive script (East Asia)|cursive script}}, which replaces the left {{zh-l|*辛}} with {{zh-l|*丿}} and the right {{zh-l|*辛}} with {{zh-l|*丶}}. Officially adopted as the simplified form of {{zh-l|*辦}} in the ''Chinese Character Simplification Scheme'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|s:漢字簡化方案|漢字簡化方案|suf=》}}) in 1956.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text: {{zh-see|辦}} <!-- Refer 《宋元以來俗字譜》 and 《字學三正》 - http://dict.variants.moe.edu.tw/variants/rbt/word_attribute.rbt?quote_code=QTA0MTA2LTAwMQ#35 -->
